game: WELCOME TO THE LOOPYou wake up passed out beside a hut. As afterimage of bright white light fades from view a warrior in a grotesque mask approaches and greets you like an old friend. Faint familiar memory begins to flood back as you realize something is very wrong...Tides of Time is a 3rd person narrative action game. Missing your memory explore the island you call home and rediscover it's inhabitants what horrific fate has befallen the island and defend your right to exist in this place. Using your words and your blade get to know your fellow islanders and discover the mystery of the loop!Engage In CombatMany inhabitants of the island are dangerous but all have a story to uncover if you can withstand them long enough to learn it.Explore the IslandMany secrets lurk in ancient forgotten places waiting to be found before it's too late.Repeat the LoopThere is no escape in death. Will you unravel the mysteries of the island or will you be lost to infinity...

Tides of Time is a 3rd person narrative action game. Explore the island you call home rediscover its inhabitants and reveal the horrific fate that has befallen the island. Using your words and your blade get to know your fellow islanders and discover the mystery of the loop!
Minimum:Requires a 64-bit processor and operating systemOS: Windows 10+Processor: Intel i5 or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GTX 960Storage: 2 GB available space
Recommended:Requires a 64-bit processor and operating systemOS: Windows 10+Processor: Intel i5 or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GTX 960Storage: 2 GB available space
